"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553007d2636872609cee3200#post_553007d2636872609cee3200
I called it that they would use cgi on this series instead.

I'm enjoying Cities: Skylnes.  I played it for 12 hours last night.  What was I doing for twelve hours?  Trying to find game breaking bugs, broken ways of playing, ways to cheat, etc and so far I haven't found many.

It's a legitimately good city building simulator.
